original_text: Then the word of the Lord came unto Jeremiah the prophet, after that Hananiah the prophet had broken the yoke from off the neck of the prophet Jeremiah, saying,
korean_text: 선지자 하나냐가 선지자 예레미야의 목에서 멍에를 꺾어 버린 후에 여호와의 말씀이 예레미야에게 임하니라 이르시기를

sentences.original_text: Then the word of the Lord came unto Jeremiah the prophet
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 주의 말씀이 예레미야 선지자에게 임하니

sentences.original_text: after that Hananiah the prophet had broken the yoke
from off the neck of the prophet Jeremiah
